fields.name: MakeBackupsImmutable
fields.description: The setting whether to make LTR backups immutable

fields.name: MonthlyRetention
fields.description: The monthly retention policy for an LTR backup in an ISO 8601 format.

fields.name: WeekOfYear
fields.description: The week of year to take the yearly backup in an ISO 8601 format.

fields.name: WeeklyRetention
fields.description: The weekly retention policy for an LTR backup in an ISO 8601 format.

fields.name: YearlyRetention
fields.description: The yearly retention policy for an LTR backup in an ISO 8601 format.
